short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive sms from all around the world.Use it to verify your accounts.Free, no register and no ads!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide your real phone number from the websites!
First disposable/temporary number extension.

With this extension, you can receive SMS from all around the world without leaving your tab. 

               - Verify your accounts (Facebook, Telegram, Paypal, Tinder,...). 
               - More than 30 countries and 200 numbers available and growing.
               - It's free, no need for registration and no ads.

*featured in Web User magazine April 2020*
